-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)))

comment: The cardinality of a disjoint finite union of finite sets. Cf. ~ hashuni . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Feb-2017.)
